name: Alpha Arbutin
description: Arbutin can help hyperpigmentation, improve acne scars, and even out skin tone. It is a plant-based substance found in bearberry, cranberries, blueberries, wheat, and pears. Alpha Arbutin is more stable and effective than its beta form. Arbutin helps stop the molecules that stimulate pigmentation and melanin in your body without killing them completely, and has a milder effect compared to hydroquinone, which is prescription strength. This makes arbutin a safe and effective choice for people with sensitive skin and uneven skin tone.

name: Babassu Oil
description: Orbignya oleifera is a type of palm, called babassu palm, that is native to South America. The oil from the seeds of this tree is similar to coconut oil. Babassu oil contains approximately 44-47% lauric acid, 15-20% myristic acid, 10-12% oleic acid, 6-9% palmitic acid, 3-5% stearic acid and 1-3% linoleic acid. Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil functions as a skin-conditioning agent - occlusive. Babassu Acid and Sodium Babassuate function as surfactants - cleansing agents and surfactants - emulsifying agents.

name: Birch Juice
description: Birch juice is a skin-soothing and hydrating tree sap. Birch juice contains 17 amino acids, antioxidants, enzymes, minerals, proteins and vitamins, including Vitamin B3 and skin-brightening Vitamin C.

name: Black Chokeberry
description: This superfood ingredient has one of the highest recorded antioxidant contents of any fruit or berry, and contributes to skin youth and radiance. Polyphenols in black chokeberry provide anti-aging and skin calming properties, treating UV-exposed skin.

name: Centella Asiatica
description: This is an antioxidant-rich ingredient that is made up of several actives such as asiatic acid, madecassic acid, and madecassoside. Several studies show positive wound-healing effects, as well as increased moisture content in skin.

name: Ellagic Acid
description: Found in high concentrations in dark fruits, ellagic acid protects against UV rays, collagen degeneration and harmful bacterial pathogens. This acid brightens skin without impacting cell DNA, making it a safe alternative to other brightening ingredients.

name: Galactomyces
description: Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate (GFF) is a derivative of fermented sake that has proven skin care benefits, including reducing the appearance of pores, blackheads and sebum; decreasing levels of acne; and improving skin brightness.

name: Gluconolactone
description: Gluconolactone is a naturally occurring polyhydroxy acid (PHA) that provides exfoliating, moisturizing and antioxidant activity without sensitizing the skin.

name: Grapeseed Oil
description: An antioxidant-rich emollient, this plant oil derived from grape seeds nourishes the skin while removing oil-based impurities gently. It has a high content of linoeleic acid, vitamin E and phenolic compounds, and an anti-inflammatory effect.

name: Green Tea
description: Also known as camellia sinensis, green tea is a well-studied antioxidant that is rich in polyphenols. Polyphenols in green tea provide anti-aging and skin calming properties, treating UV-exposed skin.

name: Hyaluronic Acid
description: Hyaluronic Acid is naturally produced in our bodies and is actually not an acid! It binds with water in our body, cushioning and lubricating our tissue to help the elasticity of our skin. It can retain 1000x its weight in water in our cells. It can be injected, consumed, and topically applied.

name: Licorice Root
description: Gentle, effective antioxidant and natural skin brightener that effectively evens out skin tone, while reducing free radicals.

name: Marshmallow Root
description: This anti-aging plant extract reduces inflammation and fine lines, as well as hydrates and protects the skin. Made up of polysaccharides and flavonoids, it also contains mucilage, a dewy substance with skin-softening and antioxidant properties.

name: Olive Oil
description: This nourishing antioxidant high in oleic acids and hydrophilic phenols has anti-aging and anti-inflammatory benefits. The combination of olive and seaberry oils helps to restore compromised barriers.

name: Persimmon Extract
description: Also known as dispyros kaki, this extract is a free radical scavenger that prevents premature aging and photo damage. It is known for its skin brightening effect by reducing melanin levels, and can also regulate sebum production.

name: Polyglutamic Acid
description: This water-soluble peptide holds four times more moisture than hyaluronic acid, and leaves skin radiant and hydrated.

name: Red Algae
description: This sea plant contains a high concentration of calcium, which gently exfoliates the skin, removing dead skin cells, reducing fine lines and hyperpigmentation, and brightening complexion.

name: Rice Ferment Filtrate (Sake)
description: This ingredient is rich in enzymes and amino acids to nourish your skin, while giving your skin a brightening boost.

name: Seaberry/Sea Buckthorn Oil
description: Rich in fatty acids such as stearic acid, oleic acid, linoleic acid, and omega-6. The bright orange coloring is due to high lycopene and carotenoid content. With time the coloring will fade but does not diminish the effectiveness of the cleanser.

name: Squalane
description: Squalane is derived from squalene, a hydrocarbon that is naturally produced by our bodies to maintain moisture in our skin. It also boosts cell regeneration and allows other ingredients to absorb more efficiently into skin. Our squalane is plant-based.

name: Tea Tree Leaf
description: This herbal antioxidant is commonly used for its antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory effects, as a gentle treatment for acne-prone skin.

name: Vitamin E
description: Vitamin E is an essential component of healthy skin, that prevents premature aging due to its powerful antioxidant properties.

name: Lactic Acid
description: Lactic Acid is an alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) found in our bodies and also dairy products. At low concentrations, it draws in moisture, and at high levels, it can dissolve skin cells to help exfoliate surface-level skin gently.
